message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY 

This paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem in a Bayesian framework and proposes a family of control policies that leverage ideas from information relaxations of stochastic dynamic optimization problems. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), Information Theory (cs.IT), and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
